<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t CurBytes = Off == 0 ? 0 : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> - Off;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All bytes beyond the alignment boundary should be removed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If emit bytes more than max bytes to emit, remove all.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
